meanings.sent3: The lixivial smell of the cleaning solution filled the room, making everyone sneeze.
meanings.sent4: The lixivial nature of the soap cut through the tough grease easily.
meanings.sent5: The lixivial properties of the detergent made it perfect for removing stains.
